amendment.description: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to expand workplace health incentives by equalizing the tax consequences of employee athletic use.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 138 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 138 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Cornyn to Amendment SA 100. (consideration: CR S1219; text: CR S1219) To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to expand workplace health incentives by equalizing the tax consequences of employee athletic use.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 138 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Cornyn to Amendment SA 100.
